data.name: Eternal Starshine
data.detailed_description:
The ancient castle is very ancient and mysterious. Many centuries have passed since the first people appeared in it already. He was slowly waiting for his new guests. The castle was inhabited by ancient evil in the form of a virus. A group of researchers decided to find valuable artifacts in the castle, but they found their last artifact. It was a deadly virus that turned researchers into zombies.

You're the only survivor who can decide his fate and get out of a terrible castle. Be careful! Going through zombie hordes is not that easy. You will encounter valuable objects and weapons that you can use on the way. Discover the dark secrets of this castle place!

CHOICE
The game will give you the choice to pass.
You can kill hordes of zombies to clear this place or you can go unnoticed
The choice is always yours!

FIRST PERSON SHOOTER
The game has several types of firearms and close arms to counter the deadly hordes of zombies.

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100U / AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2400G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 86_64-bit processor and operating system required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 7 / Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100U / AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2400G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 86_64-bit processor and operating system required
